wikipedia_page.main: Brian Percy Moll (19 May 1925 – 9 August 2013) was an English Australian comedian character actor of stage, television and film, director and producer who emigrated to Australia from his native England in 1950. Quitting his job as a publicity officer, he became a professional actor in 1956. He was best known for his soap opera television roles, but also appeared in film and numerous theatre productions.
